meanings.sent1: She sat mid the group of friends.
meanings.sent2: The cat was mid the room, playing with a ball.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel hid mid the branches, peeking out mischievously.
meanings.sent4: The sun shone brightly mid the sky, casting a warm glow.
meanings.sent5: The treasure was hidden mid the pile of rocks, waiting to be discovered.

meanings.sent1: The mid of the cake was the most delicious.
meanings.sent2: He placed the book in the mid of the shelf for easy access.
meanings.sent3: The mid of the movie had the most exciting scenes.
meanings.sent4: Her voice echoed in the mid of the empty hall.
meanings.sent5: The mid of the garden was filled with colorful flowers.

meanings.definition: The middle of a time period.
meanings.sent1: We are now in the mid of the year.
meanings.sent2: The mid of the day is usually the busiest time.
meanings.sent3: The mid of the party is when the music gets louder.
meanings.sent4: In the mid of the night, the owl hooted softly.
meanings.sent5: The mid of the game is when the tension is highest.
